name: Dirty Beach Massacre
description:
This is the final stop, there is no way back. The rooftop of "The Beach", the down town super club that is owned my Don Capello and his gang.

Fight of Don Capello's goons and henchmen to kill as many of them as possible.

Why? Revenge. Just cold-blooded revenge.

WASD to move, Left Click to Attack, Right Click to Dash, Hold shift to Aim.
